Worst stuff & airport ever โฆ I would rather come walking from Cairo to marsa alam than come at this stupid airport .

First they didnโt want me to pass cause they doubt I have a lighter n my bag, the man was very rude by asking me โฆ we spent 30 minutes at boarding because they couldnโt find a fragile sign at the whole airport!

And worst thing at the end they insist that I drink my soda on spot while I still have more than 40 minutes to the flight ๐คท๐ปโโ๏ธ

Since I was 20 years and I travel domestic & abroad and this experience & stuff & airport is definitely the worst.

As an Egyptian am very sorry for any foreigner who have to check in at this low standard (rubbish) place .
